pages.text: This is a special component, only used when trying to hack $(l:machines/security_station)Security Stations/$. It is not craftable and can only be found in dungeon loot, or (rarely) as a villager trade.
Applying a $(thing)STOP! Worm/$ while hacking will temporarily freeze the station's $(l:components/network_components#diagnostic)Diagnostic Subroutine/$ from tracing you.
